CustomField.description: Calculate the % markup value using the Markup Amount
CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Cost_of_Non_Rental__c=0, NULL, IF( ISBLANK(SBQQ__MarkupRate__c), SBQQ__MarkupAmount__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c / Total_Cost_of_Non_Rental__c , MarkupRate_Display__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculate the % markup value using the Markup Amount
CustomField.label: Markup Effective %
